title: Rohan Kotkar
author: Rohan Kotkar
content: Are you a busy professional, campaign manager or entrepreneur looking for some extra help to manage your daily tasks?Do you need someone who can assist you remotely and take care of your administrative, creative, or technical needs? Look no further, as I am offering virtual assistant services that can make your life easier and more productive.I am a trained virtual assistant who can offer 6+ hours of daily support to clients worldwide. I have expertise in various fields, including graphic designing, web designing, Microsoft Excel, and community moderation. Whether you need someone to manage your social media accounts, create eye-catching visuals for your marketing campaigns, design or update your website, organize your data, or moderate your online communities, I am here to help.As a virtual assistant, I understand the importance of flexibility and adaptability. That's why I can work according to your schedule and requirements, ensuring that your tasks are completed on time and to your satisfaction. I can also communicate effectively through email, messaging, or video conferencing to keep you updated on the progress of your projects.Moreover, I am offering my services at a reasonable rate compared to others in the market. My goal is to provide high-quality support to my clients while keeping their budget in mind. With my help, you can save time, reduce stress, and focus on your core business activities while I take care of the rest.Contact me today to discuss your requirements, and let's work together to achieve your goals.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: I remember that a year or more ago you launched your own UMC project and launched a Bounty campaign to introduce the project and find potential investors. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5367043.0Returning to the thread of the project announcement, it seems dead and has not been updated for a long time, despite the success of the bounty campaign that Julerz was the manager as I remember.Today, I was surprised to find that you are launching assistant service and you have an open loan of $50. What happened with the UCF project? Did you stop working on it? And Why not make it clear on the Ann Thread or ask OP to close it? Clarity and transparency will help people believe you and confirm your integrity. This is just advice and you are ultimately free to do whatever you want.
